Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is encrusted with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of red-painted cursive text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394284) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394284)
